game.name: Money WASTE
game.categories: 싱글 플레이어, 컨트롤러 일부 지원, 가족 공유
game.shortDescription: Start your criminal empire on the darknet. Buy businesses, hire goons, and eliminate the competition to take control of Ocean City.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Start your criminal empire on the darknet. Buy businesses, hire goons, and eliminate the competition to take control of Ocean City.
